title: Church Complaints, SNL, Tommy Monologue, Halloween Update and more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, SNL, Tommy Monologue, Halloween Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy Blessed Monday because everything is clicking on all cylinders! The Chief Love Officer tells a woman that the situation she is in makes "perfect sense" and there is a little humor attached to that. The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem is curious if it is okay to send 45 a case of Clorox to help with his IV drip. The premiere of SNL was hosted by Chris Rock with musical guest Megan Thee Stallion. 45 contracted COVID-19 and was released from the hospital on Sunday. Fool #2 asks the question, "Why isn't James Bond 007 Black?" The NFL has been struck with COVID-19. 96% of parents still plan on celebrating Halloween this year. Nephew Tommy has a new monologue for us. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells us why we are in dire need of a new direction and how to do it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy Blessed Monday because everything is clicking on all cylinders! The Chief Love Officer tells a woman that the situation she is in makes "perfect sense" and there is a little humor attached to that. The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem is curious if it is okay to send 45 a case of Clorox to help with his IV drip. The premiere of SNL was hosted by Chris Rock with musical guest Megan Thee Stallion. 45 contracted COVID-19 and was released from the hospital on Sunday. Fool #2 asks the question, "Why isn't James Bond 007 Black?" The NFL has been struck with COVID-19. 96% of parents still plan on celebrating Halloween this year. Nephew Tommy has a new monologue for us. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells us why we are in dire need of a new direction and how to do it.
